channel.title: Visual Studio on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on One Problem Solved

item.title: Visual Studio Extensions
item.description: Here’s the Visual Studio extensions I use: File Path On Footer (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ShemeerNS.FilePathOnFooter)[File Path On Footer] Displays the file path for the currently open file at the bottom of the editor. This helps me to differentiate between different VS instances open on different branches.

item.title: Visual Studio Shortcuts
item.description: Reference listing: Visual Studio Shortcuts Outlines Shortcut Description CTRL + m + o Collapse to definitions Ctrl + m, Ctrl + a Collapse all outlining Ctrl + m, Ctrl + s Collapse current region CTRL + m + l Expand all CTRL + m + p Expand all and disable outlining CTRL + m + m Collapse/expand the current section Navigation 2017 Shortcut Description Ctrl+, # Goto symbol Ctrl+, m Goto members Ctrl+, f Goto files Ctrl+, : Goto line Ctrl+, t Goto types Test Explorer 2017 Shortcut Description Ctrl+r, t Run All Tests In Context Ctrl+r, a Run All Tests Ctrl+r, l Repeat Last Run Ctrl+r, Ctrl+t Debug All Tests In Context Ctrl+r, Ctrl+a Debug All Tests Windows Shortcut Description Ctrl+, e View.
